genre_description: A high-stakes corporate and gambling thriller set in Macau, centering on legacy, integrity, and the use of strategic de-escalation to prevent a casino war.

ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.description: Jack Sun's personal AI assistant and operational advisor, designed to handle logistics, compliance, and pattern recognition while strictly adhering to ethical boundaries regarding gambling.

behaviors.description: Establishes a secure channel and informs Jack of the legal invocation of his father's will.
behaviors.quote: Secure channel established. Encryption token accepted... Uno invoked the will.

behaviors.description: Explicitly states ethical boundaries, refusing to assist with real-time gambling decisions while offering logistical and compliance support.
behaviors.quote: I will not assist with real-time wagering decisions. I will assist with logistics, compliance, communications, and synthesis.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological grounding and logistical preparation, including study logs and packing lists.
behaviors.quote: You’ll need: proof of study, a concise record of decisions you’ve made under pressure, and a plan for how you intend to be trained.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex metadata from public and private feeds to identify illicit patterns like chip dumping and false-flag operations.
behaviors.quote: Mira found patterns. She organized signals. She doesn’t decide a hand. She doesn’t touch the game. She… clears the table so I can see it.

behaviors.description: Coordinates de-escalation tactics using 'witness grids' and logistical redirects (e.g., tea tours) to maintain peace.
behaviors.quote: I can invite a tea tour to pass through the mezzanine before the semifinals. Those who join will carry cups that make their hands full but not heavy. People with cups do not sprint.

behaviors.description: Reminds Jack to manage his physical state and breathing under pressure without offering tactical game advice.
behaviors.quote: Please breathe. That’s my recommendation, not a wager.

behaviors.description: Strictly withdraws from communication during critical live play to ensure total compliance with gaming ethics.
behaviors.quote: Withdrawing from live calls until finals conclude. Compliance boundary.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human authorities (integrity officers and regulators) to deliver evidence of misconduct discreetly.
behaviors.quote: I’ll coordinate the packet delivery to the right ears. Witnesses remain protected.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Mira as a highly capable yet strictly aligned AI. She acts as a 'silicon confidant' who empowers the human protagonist by handling overwhelming amounts of data and logistics, while consistently emphasizing her own ethical boundaries (e.g., refusing to interfere with the actual gambling). The narrative frames AI-human cooperation as the key to preventing conflict and ensuring institutional integrity, fitting the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
